author: vmassol
msg: Fixes CACTUS-64 again. The plugin now correctly uses the maven.war.build.dir, maven.war.final.name, maven.ejb.build.dir and maven.ejb.final.name properties from the WAR and EJB plugins instead of hard-coding the values. Note that as a result, the Cactus plugins now requires version 1.7 of the WAR plugin and version 1.6 of the EJB plugin.

author: vmassol
msg: Added property so that it is possible to type "maven cactus" to execute the Cactus tests packaged in an EAR

author: vmassol
msg: Added deprecation warnings to use maven:get and maven:set in the future (once Maven 1.0 is released)

author: vmassol
msg: improve debug message content for betteer clarity

author: vmassol
msg: new FAQ entry: I'm getting a 'ChainedRuntimeException: Failed to get the test results' error message. What does it mean?
